concept.title: Where to eat near Shanks Hall?
concept.shortdesc: If you would like to cater for your event in Shanks or grab a bite to eat during a break, there is no shortage of great restuarants nearby.

conbody.p: If you walk out of Shanks Hall on the backside that is next to the Moss Arts Center, you'll be on Turner Street on which you can find the following restaurants:
